meanings.definition: A person who takes advantage of others' generosity without giving anything in return.
meanings.sent1: The freeloaders always expect free meals from their friends.
meanings.sent2: The community center provides meals for freeloaders in need.
meanings.sent3: The freeloaders at the picnic ate all the food without even saying thank you.
meanings.sent4: The freeloaders in the office never lift a finger to help with any tasks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the freeloaders sitting back while others work hard is quite striking.

meanings.definition: Those who habitually rely on others for support or resources without contributing themselves.
meanings.sent1: The freeloaders always ask for money but never offer to help in return.
meanings.sent2: It's frustrating to deal with freeloaders who never pitch in for group projects.
meanings.sent3: The freeloaders at the party kept asking for drinks but never brought any themselves.
meanings.sent4: The freeloaders in the neighborhood always borrow tools but never return them.
meanings.sent5: The concept of freeloaders depending on others for everything is quite vivid.
